message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $120?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do $110, but I was really thinking more along the lines of $115. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go above $105. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I can see you're a tough negotiator, Bob! I can do $110, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that. It's a great product, and I think it's worth it. Would you be willing to meet me at $110?
I understand you're not willing to go lower than $110, but I'm still looking to save some money. Would you be willing to meet me at $108?
I can see you're really trying to get the best deal, Bob! I can meet you halfway between $108 and $110, so I'll offer you $109. That's the lowest I can go.
